job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Below is the Job Details  brTitle  Data Scientist AssociatebrLocation Thousand Oaks CA Remote  Need to visit site whenever neededbrContract  13 months with possible extensionbrbrCommentsbr	Flexible commuter local candidates are highly preferred in case they need to go onsitebr	Some PharmaHealthcare industry experience is a huge plusbr	Must have Databricks and SmartsheetbrDescriptionbr	This ideal candidate will be responsible for providing support to advance artificial intelligence and data analytics efforts by building machine learning models and supporting their implementation and deployment through collaborations with stakeholdersbrResponsibilities includebr	Build machine learning models through integration of multiple data sourcesbr	Leverage large datasets to conduct endto end analytics that include data gathering and requirements specifications processing analytics and presentationsbr	Interact crossfunctionally with a wide variety of people and teamsbr	Work closely with subject matter experts to deliver value by developing novel practical scientific datadriven solutions to meet business needsbrBasic Qualificationsbr	Bachelors degree mathematics computer science engineering or other quantitative disciplinebrPreferred Qualificationsbr	Knowledge of comprehensive set of data analytics and modeling methods such as unsupervised ie PCA KMeans supervised ie PLS treebased algorithms and deep learning approaches and in their application to biotechnology processesbr	Familiarity working with large data sets data mining and machine learning toolsbr	Familiarity with various artificial intelligence applicationsbr	Proficiency in Python and SQL Programming Languagesbr	Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect organize analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracybr	Independent selfmotivated organized able to multitask in project environments and skilled in communication facilitation and collaborationbr	Team player prepared to work in and embrace a teambased culture that relies on collaboration for effective decisionmakingbr	Familiarity with DevOps and good software practices ie version control continuous integration test driven development
